document.full_text: manchester city is on the verge of qualifying for the group phase of nest season's champions league after beating stoke 3-0 tuesday night, three days after defeating the same opponent in the fa cup final to end a 35-year title drought.
document.title: manchester city beats stoke 3-0 in premier league
lines_and_colors: manchester city is on the verge of qualifying for the group phase of nest season's champions league after beating stoke 3-0 tuesday night, three days after defeating the same opponent in the fa cup final to end a 35-year title drought.
